extendedInfo.description: This app is a (humble) tribute to Tony Monroe's cowsay.You can read more about the original cowsay here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CowsayThis app has the following features:- themes (light / dark / metro);- characters (cow / sheep / cid)- custom eyes;- custom tongue;- cow say;- cow think;- cow amuse me (random messages);- text-to-speech;- mute checkbox.More features to come soon!The source code is at github:https://github.com/pedrogustavotorres/cowsayappenjoy! :)
